Trigger: Safety&AI: Database --[Field data collection]--> Data acquisition

Template: Engineering team shall perform field data collection for <Task> and store results in <Database> with <sampling_plan> and <safety_controls>.

Template: Engineering team shall annotate <Database> with <label_schema> using <ANN> and achieve inter-annotator agreement ≥ <kappa>.

Template: Engineering team shall synthesize <Database> using <ANN> ensuring distributional parity within Δ <parity_delta>.

Template: Engineering team shall augment <Database> using <ANN> with documented transforms <transform_list> and bias check <bias_check>.

Template: Engineering team shall label <Database> using <ANN> with QA sampling rate ≥ <qa_rate>.

Template: Engineering team shall train the <ANN> using the <Database>.

Template: Engineering team shall retrain <ANN> using <Database> when <drift_condition> is detected, within <t_max>.

Template: Engineering team shall evaluate model outputs in <Database> using <ANN> against <eval_protocol> and meet <acceptance_thresholds>.

Template: Engineering team shall curate <Database> from <Database> maintaining lineage and versioning in <data_catalog>.

Template: Owner shall propagate <Work Product> to dependent work products and update traceability.

Template: <Lifecycle Phase> shall re-use <Lifecycle Phase> where applicable and record justification when not re-used.

Trigger: Gov: Work Product --[Derived from]--> Work Product
Template: <Work Product> shall be derived from <Work Product> with change impact analysis.

Trigger: Use Case Diagram: Actor --[Association]--> Use Case
Template: In Use Case Diagram, the Association between <Actor> and <Use Case> shall be modeled per the metamodel, and the model checker shall verify conformance during CI.
Notes: Structural conformance requirement; meaningful for engineering model CI.

Template: In Block Diagram, the Association between <Block> and <Block> shall be modeled per the metamodel, and the model checker shall verify conformance during CI.
Notes: Structural conformance requirement; meaningful for engineering model CI.

Template: In Internal Block Diagram, the Connector between <Part> and <Part> shall be modeled per the metamodel, and the model checker shall verify conformance during CI.

Trigger: Activity Diagram: Flow Initial -> Action allowed
Template: In Activity Diagram, a flow from <Initial> to <Action> shall be permitted and modeled explicitly with guards/events as applicable.
Notes: Explicitly enumerates allowed flows to enable automated model linting.

Trigger: Node type Decision present with outgoing flows
Template: All outgoing flows from <Decision> shall include guard expressions formatted as <guard_syntax> and be complete and mutually exclusive.
Notes: MECE guards; engineering-relevant for deterministic behavior.

Template: A <Decision> shall not have more than 4 outgoing flows.
Notes: Static structural rule enabling automated checks.

Template: The <subject> shall <action> <object> to achieve <business_objective>, verified by <verification_method> and recorded in <record>.
Notes: Operation/engineering-aligned ubiquitous requirement.

Trigger: Constraint node via Constrained by / Governed by
Template: The <subject> shall comply with <standard_or_policy> and retain objective evidence in <record>.
Notes: Compliance requirement with auditable trail.
